contents:
https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0924857920301643

这是论文原文，这篇文章并未提及病毒源头，但是确实提到了武汉肺炎在12月就开始在法国传播，我将原文中一段贴在这里

We report an observation of a patient infected with COVID-19 one month before the first reported cases in our country. On admission, the patient presented clinical signs and radiological patterns frequently seen previously in the Chinese12 and Italian13 cohorts. Identifying the first infected patient is of great epidemiological interest as it changes dramatically our knowledge regarding SARS-COV-2 and its spreading in the country. Moreover, the absence of a link with China and the lack of recent travel suggest that the disease was already spreading among the French population at the end of December, 2019.
